FAQ

What is the attire?

Black tie optional.

Will there be any greek dancing?
The Kalamatianos is a traditional greek dance and we would love to have all of our guests join us on the dance floor. Here's a breakdown of the steps, and the full dance in action.
Can I bring a date?
If your invitation does not say "and Guest" we would prefer if it was just you.
